content.question: A historian could best use the ordinance about usury as an example of

choices.label: an attempt to implement mercantilist policies
a traditional restriction on market activities
an attack on the financial policies of the Roman Catholic Church
an effort to stimulate economic growth

content.answer: a traditional restriction on market activities
